Hi Dimitrios,



1. The output is correct and specularity comes first ([http://www.artifice.com/radiance/rad_materials.html](http://www.artifice.com/radiance/rad_materials.html)). The order was a user interface decision and since we have it like this in all the other components I would leave it as it is.



2. It's a bit more complicated. You can read more here ([http://radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2010-freiburg/PDF/Da...](http://radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2010-freiburg/PDF/DavidMead.pdf)). Orn also made a good description based on this presentation ([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/radiance-bl...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/radiance-blotching-with-translucent-material?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1313259&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)).



Mostapha
